title: World's Thinnest iPhone Battery Case!
description: Video you might have missed -   ThinCharge iPhone 6/6S Battery Case -   The ThinCharge for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6s offers up 2600mAh of power in a very slim form factor. What do you guys think, is this one better than the official Apple iPhone battery case?  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
